data.message:
How do u stop someone from bashing some one that's blocked
Others see it sent to me and it's not good

replies.message: Hi Charlotte. If someone is being bullied or harassed on Facebook, please report it: http://bit.ly/2p8rIOT. You can also find tips and resources for helping you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/2pqLhSZ and on our Bullying Prevention Hub: http://bit.ly/2oB7rCU. Please keep in mind that if you feel someone is in immediate danger, you should contact your local authorities. -William
